meanings.definition: The act of not taking part in something.
meanings.sent1: Her nonparticipations in the school play disappointed her friends.
meanings.sent2: The nonparticipations of the shy student were often misunderstood.
meanings.sent3: His nonparticipations in group projects made him the mysterious classmate.
meanings.sent4: The nonparticipations of the silent observer spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The nonparticipations of the audience created an awkward silence.

meanings.sent1: The nonparticipations of the injured player affected the team's performance.
meanings.sent2: In a competition, nonparticipations can lead to disqualification.
meanings.sent3: The nonparticipations of the sleepy student were evident in class.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with nonparticipations during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Nonparticipations in the voting process can impact the outcome.

meanings.sent1: The nonparticipations of the introverted employee were noticed by the manager.
meanings.sent2: Nonparticipations in the project resulted in delays.
meanings.sent3: His nonparticipations in the conversation made it awkward for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The success of the event depended on minimizing nonparticipations.
meanings.sent5: The team's victory was hindered by nonparticipations from key members.
